message:
NOTE: THIS ARTICLE HAS BEEN PULLED FROM BEFOREITSNEWS (WHERE IT ORIGINALLY APPEARED). NOT SURE WHY.

Before Its News
by Zen Gardner
February 23rd, 2011

Why all these “coincidences” involving natural disasters? Are they not “natural” after all?

Here’s the excerpt that caught my eye this morning. It may not be evidence of anything, yet it might. After all, the U.S. military had a huge operation “simulating” a tsunami scenario in Haiti in full swing at the time of the Haiti quake, and we also know the HAARP facility was pumping full blast at the time. No accidental “coincidence” there.

(From NZHerald.co.nz)

    Defence Force

    The Air Force has been helping to evacuate people from Christchurch.

    A Royal New Zealand Air Force C-130 Hercules aircraft evacuated people from Christchurch to Wellington this morning, and a second will follow, the Defence Force said.

    It said staff had been preparing for a large exercise in the region and were now instead helping with the rescue effort.

http://theintelhub.com/2011/02/23/nz-military-preparing-for-large-exercise-when-quake-hit/
